definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: It is a printing and dyeing mill effluent decolorization for precipitation of a new type of pharmaceutical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 它是一種針對印染廠污水的脫色沉澱治理的新型藥劑。

sentences.english: Our company specializes in textile printing, Our products are of good quality and low price.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司專業與紡織印染，產品質量高，價格低。

sentences.english: Printing and Dyeing in connection with the import advanced equipment and technology.
sentences.chinese: 在印染方面擁有先進的進口設備和技術。

sentences.english: The textile, printing and dyeing industry discharges majority of industrial wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 紡織印染行業是工業廢水排放大戶。

sentences.english: A review is made on the research achievements of mist-exhaust in workshops full of heat and damp.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了紡織印染廠熱溼車間排霧問題的研究成果。

sentences.english: This advanced dyeing technology can make the products unfading.
sentences.chinese: 這種先進的印染技術，使產品永不褪色。

sentences.english: Using cyclic activated sludge system(CASS) to treat a kind of dyes solution has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 採用CASS系統對某印染廠廢水進行了處理研究。

sentences.english: In printing and dyeing of textiles, it obtained excellent.
sentences.chinese: 在紡織印染中，獲得極好的效果。

sentences.english: Printing and dyeing wastewater was treated by the two wastes, iron scraps and fly ash.
sentences.chinese: 利用廢鐵屑與粉煤灰兩種廢物集合處理印染廢水。

sentences.english: The raising and dyeing of the denim are presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了雙面牛仔絨的起絨及印染全過程。

sentences.english: Dye vat is a key equipment in printing and dyeing industry.
sentences.chinese: 染缸是印染行業中的關鍵設備之一。

sentences.english: This paper describes the treatment of printing and dyeing wastewater by pressurized activated sludge process.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用加壓生化法處理印染廢水的研究成果。

sentences.english: Textile auxiliaries are one field of the necessary chemicals for textile production.
sentences.chinese: 紡織印染助劑是紡織品生產必需的化學品之一。

sentences.english: Mingyan Textiles Printing and Dyeing Co. , Ltd. was set up in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 明洋紡織印染有限公司創建於一九九二年。

sentences.english: My graduation thesis was on the application of computer to printing and dyeing.
sentences.chinese: 我的畢業論文是關於電腦在印染業中的應用。

sentences.english: In the industry and printing and dyeing industry, and licorice also have a wide range of uses.
sentences.chinese: 在工業和印染業中，甘草也有廣泛的用途。

definition: to roll used in dyeing trough
